item.description: No 100/2025 : 1 August 2025 Judgment of the Court of Justice in Case C-666/23 Volkswagen es de en fr it pl pt Approximation of laws A vehicle manufacturer cannot be exempted from its liability for an unlawful defeat device on the grounds that an EC type-approval has been granted.
